content: all row 11 rs k3 k3 m1 seven times k6 37 sts row 20 ws p all row 12 ws p all row 19 rs k3 k3 k2tog nine times k7 46 sts row 13 rs k all row 18 ws p all row 14 ws p all row 17 rs k all row 15 rs k4 k3 m1 nine times k6 46 sts row 16 ws p all row 16 ws p all row 15 rs k4 k2 k2tog nine times k6 37 sts row 17 rs k all row 14 ws p all row 18 ws p all row 13 rs k all row 19 rs k3 k4 m1 nine times k7 55 sts row 12 ws p all row 20 ws p all row 11 rs k3 k2 k2tog seven times k6 30 sts row 21 rs k all row 10 ws p all row 22 ws p all row 9 rs k all row 8 ws p all front half row 7 rs k3 k2tog k1 eight times k3 22 sts make note of number of last row worked ws row join to other side to begin working in the round take that number total row worked and divide it round 6 k1 pass last st of last row over this st k1 by 3 if that s not a whole number round up to the m1 k to last st m1 k1 23 sts next whole number this number = x round 5 k all fck ice frog mod by lee meredith leedoesstuff com page 3 round 4 k2tog k1 seven times k2tog 15 sts round 3 k all round 2 k2tog k2 three times k2tog k1 11 sts round 1 k2tog k1 three times k2tog 7 sts finishing break yarn thread onto yarn needle bring through stuffed with scrap fabric live sts then through hole to inside and pull closed thread co tail onto yarn needle weave yarn around through co sts bring yarn through hole to inside and pull hole closed weave in all the other ends just a little if you didn t do it while knitting to secure them to the inside of the piece yarn ends don t need to be trimmed in stuffed with scrap yarn fact they re useful as part of the stuffing tie the co and ending tails together on the inside of the eye tightly so that the back and front touch if you plan to use just a little stuffing or more loosely if you want to stuff the eyes a lot and make them more 3-dimensional use white yarn and the yarn needle to stitch a small circle or star of embroidery in the upper right of the edge of the black part note that you may prefer to wait and do this after the eyes are attached to an item so you can place the spots better in context repeat everything for the second eye block the eyes by soaking squeezing water
